quote: Dr. King used Gandhi's commitment to non-violence and to passive resistance.
If your energy is as boundless as your ambition, total commitment may be a way of life you should seriously consider.
Dr. King used Gandhi's commitment to non-violence and to passive resistance.
If your energy is as boundless as your ambition, total commitment may be a way of life you should seriously consider.
Men are distinguished from women by their commitment to do violence rather than to be victimized by it.
The difference between involvement and commitment is like ham and eggs. The chicken is involved; the pig is committed.
The only limit to your impact is your imagination and commitment.
There's no abiding success without commitment.
There's no abiding success without commitment.
Total commitment is the common denominator among all successful men and women.
Unless commitment is made, there are only promises and hopes; but no plans.
You need to make a commitment, and once you make it, then life will give you some answers.
